Name: LevelNumber
Description: The number associated with the Level. Levels are numbered consecutively starting with Level 1 at the highest (most aggregated) Level.

Name: LevelCodeType
Description: Indicates whether the code at the Level is alphabetical, numerical or alphanumerical.

Name: LevelCodeStructure
Description: Indicates how the code at the Level is constructed of numbers, letters and separators.

Name: DummyCode
Description: Rule for the construction of dummy codes from the codes of the next higher Level (used when one or several categories are the same in two consecutive Levels).

Name: DefiningConceptReference
Description: A concept which describes the level.
